attributes.action:
Fireworks need to be silent!!!
It isn’t only animals who are frightened
attributes.additional_details:
People bleat on about animal cruelty yet have no issues with fireworks
They also trigger PTSD sufferers and frighten children
Make them silent.  Simple
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks unless they’re silent.  Who goes to a fireworks display to listen to the fireworks ???

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
